title: Strengthening AI Competencies: Remote Mathematical Problem-Solving Course Based on FTSL (Federated Task-Specific Learning)

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical concepts (foundational knowledge) required for real-world problem-solving at over 80% accuracy across the six dimensions of FTSL
Learners can revise and improve problem-solving strategies based on peer feedback through team-based online discussions
Learners can describe decision-making processes that incorporate ethical considerations (human dimension) in mathematical modeling
Learners can state their value perception of mathematics (interest dimension) at 4.0/5.0 or higher in a self-assessment report at the course conclusion
Learners can synthesize learning content (integration dimension) to complete a case study applicable to real professional environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
